DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine short-term protective effect Ultra-Violet filtering contact lenses macular pigment ocular density .
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Study Health Benefits Ultra-Violet Filtering Contact Lenses
DOC.criteria: The subject adapt soft contact lens wearer The subject 's spherical error equivalent ( Best Sphere correct back vertex distance ) must 0.50 diopter ( D ) 6.00D +0.50D +4.00D eye The subject must refractive astigmatism eye 0.75D less The subject must best correct visual acuity 6/9 good eye . The subject must appear able willing adhere instruction set forth clinical protocol The subject must read sign statement inform consent The subject must least 18 year age Systemic ocular allergy might interfere contact lens wear Systemic disease might interfere contact lens wear Ocular disease might interfere contact lens wear Grade 3 4 Slit Lamp Findings Greater 0.1 difference macular pigment optical density ( MPOD ) finding right leave eye baseline visit On change stable medication take medication know affect tear film Active ocular surface pathology Use ocular medication Had anterior ocular surgery ocular surgery injury within 8 week immediately prior enrollment study Significant ocular tissue anomaly Presence two corneal scar either eye Pregnancy lactation , intend become pregnant time period study Any medical condition may prejudicial study Diabetes Infectious disease ( e.g . Hepatitis , tuberculosis ) Contagious immunosuppressive disease ( e.g . HIV )
